languages.text: {n}Пленники сжимаются под тяжестью вашего взгляда. На измазанных кровью и слезами лицах офицеров, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}техноматов{/g} и простых работяг кровоточат позорные метки: "предатель", "еретик", "отступница", "изменник". Судя по следам и глубине порезов, обновляли их с завидным усердием.{/n}

{n}The prisoners cower beneath the weight of your gaze. Blood drips down the tear-stained faces of the captured officers, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g}, and workers. A word has been carved into each of their foreheads with meticulous precision: "Traitor." "Heretic." "Apostate." "Renegade." The cuts have been diligently and regularly reopened to prevent healing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пленники сжимаются под тяжестью вашего взгляда. На измазанных кровью и слезами лицах офицеров, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}техноматов{/g} и простых работяг кровоточат позорные метки: "предатель", "еретик", "отступница", "изменник". Судя по следам и глубине порезов, обновляли их с завидным усердием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The captives cower under your heavy gaze. Carved into the bloodied and tearstained faces of officers, technomats, and simple working people are blood-oozing words of shame. "Traitor." "Heretic." "Apostate." "Renegade." Judging by the depth of the cuts and the marks left, the writing has been refreshed with impressive diligence.{/n}

{n}The captives cower under your heavy gaze. Carved into the bloodied and tearstained faces of officers, technomats, and simple working people are blood-oozing words of shame. "Traitor." "Heretic." "Apostate." "Renegade." Judging by the depth of the cuts and the marks left, the writing has been refreshed with impressive diligence.{/n}

{n}The prisoners cower beneath the weight of your gaze. Blood drips down the tearstained faces of the captured officers, technomats, and workers. A word has been carved into each of their foreheads with meticulous precision: "Traitor." "Heretic." "Apostate." "Renegade." The cuts have been made with diligent regularity to prevent the wounds from healing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les prisonniers se recroquevillent sous le poids de votre regard. Les visages des officiers, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomates{/g} et ouvriers capturés sont baignés de larmes et de sang. Un mot a été gravé avec une précision méticuleuse sur le front de chacun d'entre eux : « traître », « hérétique », « apostat », « renégat ». Les entailles ont été faites de sorte à empêcher toute cicatrisation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners cower beneath the weight of your gaze. Blood drips down the tear-stained faces of the captured officers, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g}, and workers. A word has been carved into each of their foreheads with meticulous precision: "Traitor." "Heretic." "Apostate." "Renegade." The cuts have been diligently and regularly reopened to prevent healing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les prisonniers se recroquevillent sous le poids de votre regard. Les visages des officiers, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomates{/g} et ouvriers capturés sont baignés de larmes et de sang. Un mot a été gravé avec une précision méticuleuse sur le front de chacun d'entre eux : « traître », « hérétique », « apostat », « renégat ». Les entailles ont été faites de sorte à empêcher toute cicatrisation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los prisioneros se echan a temblar bajo el peso de tu mirada. La sangre cae por las caras manchadas de lágrimas de los oficiales, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}tecnómatas{/g} y trabajadores capturados. Se ha grabado una palabra en su frente con una precisión meticulosa: «traidor», «hereje», «apóstata», «renegado». Los cortes se han reabierto con una regularidad exhaustiva para evitar que las heridas se cierren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners cower beneath the weight of your gaze. Blood drips down the tear-stained faces of the captured officers, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g}, and workers. A word has been carved into each of their foreheads with meticulous precision: "Traitor." "Heretic." "Apostate." "Renegade." The cuts have been diligently and regularly reopened to prevent healing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los prisioneros se echan a temblar bajo el peso de tu mirada. La sangre cae por las caras manchadas de lágrimas de los oficiales, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}tecnómatas{/g} y trabajadores capturados. Se ha grabado una palabra en su frente con una precisión meticulosa: «traidor», «hereje», «apóstata», «renegado». Los cortes se han reabierto con una regularidad exhaustiva para evitar que las heridas se cierren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在你的注视下，这些囚犯畏缩不已。鲜血从这些被俘的军官、{g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}技工{/g}与工人泪痕斑斑的脸上滴落，每个人的额头上都仔仔细细地刻着几个字——“叛徒”、“异端分子”、“叛教者”、“叛党”。额头上的伤口被定期重新割开，以免愈合。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners cower beneath the weight of your gaze. Blood drips down the tear-stained faces of the captured officers, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g}, and workers. A word has been carved into each of their foreheads with meticulous precision: "Traitor." "Heretic." "Apostate." "Renegade." The cuts have been diligently and regularly reopened to prevent healing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在你的注视下，这些囚犯畏缩不已。鲜血从这些被俘的军官、{g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}技工{/g}与工人泪痕斑斑的脸上滴落，每个人的额头上都仔仔细细地刻着几个字——“叛徒”、“异端分子”、“叛教者”、“叛党”。额头上的伤口被定期重新割开，以免愈合。{/n}

languages.text: {n}囚人たちはあなたの視線の重みに竦む。捕らえられた将校、{g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}テクノマット{/g}、そして労働者たちの、涙で濡れた顔から血が滴り落ちる。彼らの額にはそれぞれ言葉が刻まれている。「裏切り者」「異端者」「背教者」「反逆者」と、傷口が繰り返し開き、癒えないようにと、正確に切り刻まれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners cower beneath the weight of your gaze. Blood drips down the tear-stained faces of the captured officers, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g}, and workers. A word has been carved into each of their foreheads with meticulous precision: "Traitor." "Heretic." "Apostate." "Renegade." The cuts have been diligently and regularly reopened to prevent healing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人たちはあなたの視線の重みに竦む。捕らえられた将校、{/g}テクノマット{/n}、そして労働者たちの、涙で濡れた顔から血が滴り落ちる。彼らの額にはそれぞれ言葉が刻まれている。「裏切り者」「異端者」「背教者」「反逆者」と、傷口が繰り返し開き、癒えないようにと、正確に切り刻まれている。{g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}

languages.text: {n}Die Gefangenen kauern sich unter dem Gewicht deines Blicks zusammen. Blut tropft die tränenbenetzten Gesichter der gefangenen Offiziere, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}Technomaten{/g} und Arbeiter hinab. Jedem von ihnen wurde mit größter Präzision ein Wort in die Stirn geritzt: "Verräter." "Ketzerin." "Apostat." "Abtrünniger." Die Schnitte wurden sorgsam und regelmäßig geöffnet, um eine Heilung zu verhindern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners cower beneath the weight of your gaze. languages.text: {n}Mahkûmlar, onlara yönelttiğin bakışların ağırlığı karşısında sinip kalıyor. Esir düşmüş subayların, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}teknomatların{/g} ve işçilerin ter içinde kalmış yüzlerinden kan damlıyor. Her birinin alnına muhteşem bir özenle birer kelime yazılmış: "Hain." "Kâfir." "Mürtet." "Dönek." Yaraları iyileşmesin diye sık ve gayretli bir şekilde yeniden açılmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoners cower beneath the weight of your gaze. Blood drips down the tear-stained faces of the captured officers, {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g}, and workers. A word has been carved into each of their foreheads with meticulous precision: "Traitor." "Heretic." "Apostate." "Renegade." The cuts have been diligently and regularly reopened to prevent healing.{/n}
